overview: Happy Valentine's Day to everyone today. It is a day to show your loved ones you care and love for them and receive love. I love you! Thank you so much for 53000 ( as I am typing this ). Please know you are loved!  A very common question I get is 'Megan, what are your favourite films?'. I often don't know how to answer this because there are just so many that I could list. But 'her' has to be one of the top 3. The writing, storytelling, cinematography, concept.. the list goes on. So, today, I decided to create a short film inspired by this fantastic film.
title: Him
